languages.text: {n}Лицо техножреца, стоящего напротив, скрыто медной маской. Она не является цельной, а сложена из фрагментов множества аугментаций. Вам уже доводилось встречать этого человека — члена свиты Лорд-инквизитора Калькасара по прозвищу Медный шепот.{/n}

{n}The face of the Tech-Priest standing opposite is hidden behind a brass mask. Rather than being one piece, it is assembled from the fragments of many augmetics. You have met this man before. He is called Brasswhisper, a member of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's retinue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо техножреца, стоящего напротив, скрыто медной маской. Она не является цельной, а сложена из фрагментов множества аугментаций. Вам уже доводилось встречать этого человека — члена свиты Лорд-инквизитора Калькасара по прозвищу Медный шепот.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The face of the Tech-Priest standing opposite is hidden behind a brass mask. Rather than being one piece, it's assembled from fragments of many augmetics. You've met this person before. They're a member of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's retinue, nicknamed Brasswhisper.{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: {n}The face of the Tech-Priest standing opposite is hidden behind a brass mask. Rather than being one piece, it's assembled from fragments of many augmetics. You've met this person before. They're a member of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's retinue, nicknamed Brasswhisper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The face of the Tech-Priest standing opposite is hidden behind a brass mask. Rather than being one piece, it is assembled from the fragments of many augmetics. You have met this man before. He is called Brasswhisper, a member of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's retinue.{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}向かいに立つ技術司祭の顔は真ちゅう製のマスクに隠れている。それは1個のマスクというより、いくつものオーグメティックの破片を組み合わせたものだ。あなたは以前にも彼と会ったことがある。ブラスウィスパーと呼ばれていた者、つまりロード・インクィジターのカルカサルに付き従っていたひとりだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The face of the Tech-Priest standing opposite is hidden behind a brass mask. Rather than being one piece, it is assembled from the fragments of many augmetics. You have met this man before. He is called Brasswhisper, a member of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's retinue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}向かいに立つ技術司祭の顔は真ちゅう製のマスクに隠れている。それは1個のマスクというより、いくつものオーグメティックの破片を組み合わせたものだ。あなたは以前にも彼と会ったことがある。ブラスウィスパーと呼ばれていた者、つまりロード・インクィジターのカルカサルに付き従っていたひとりだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}站在对面的技术神甫戴着黄铜面具，挡住了脸。这个面具不是一块整体，而是由许多植入物的碎片组装而成。你以前见过这个人，这个人被称为“铜语”，是大审判官卡尔卡扎的随从。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The face of the Tech-Priest standing opposite is hidden behind a brass mask. Rather than being one piece, it is assembled from the fragments of many augmetics. You have met this man before. He is called Brasswhisper, a member of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's retinue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}站在对面的技术祭司戴着黄铜面具，挡住了脸。这个面具不是一块整体，而是由许多植入物的碎片组装而成。你以前见过这个人，这个人被称为“铜语”，是卡尔卡扎审判长的随从。{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}Le visage du technoprêtre qui se tient à l'opposé est dissimulé derrière un masque en cuivre composé de fragments de plusieurs augmétiques. Vous avez déjà rencontré cet homme : il se nomme Murmecuivre et fait partie de l'entourage du seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The face of the Tech-Priest standing opposite is hidden behind a brass mask. Rather than being one piece, it is assembled from the fragments of many augmetics. You have met this man before. He is called Brasswhisper, a member of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's retinue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage du technoprêtre qui se tient à l'opposé est dissimulé derrière un masque en cuivre composé de fragments de plusieurs augmétiques. Vous l'avez déjà rencontré : il se nomme Murmecuivre et fait partie de l'entourage du seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar.{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}El tecnosacerdote que tienes delante oculta su cara bajo una máscara de latón. En lugar de ser una sola pieza, está formada a partir de muchos auméticos. Ya os habéis visto antes: se llama Susurro de latón y forma parte del séquito del Lord Inquisidor Calcazar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The face of the Tech-Priest standing opposite is hidden behind a brass mask. Rather than being one piece, it is assembled from the fragments of many augmetics. You have met this man before. He is called Brasswhisper, a member of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's retinue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnosacerdote que tienes delante oculta su cara bajo una máscara de bronce. En lugar de ser una sola pieza, está formada a partir de muchos auméticos. Ya has conocido a esta persona antes: se llama Susurro de latón y forma parte del séquito del Lord Inquisidor Calcazar».{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}Das Gesicht des Techpriesters, der dir gegenübersteht, ist hinter einer Messingmaske verborgen. Sie ist kein einzelnes Teil, sondern aus den Fragmenten vieler Augmentationen zusammengesetzt. Du bist diesem Mann schon einmal begegnet. Er heißt Messingflüsterer und ist Mitglied des Gefolges von Großinquisitor Calcazar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The face of the Tech-Priest standing opposite is hidden behind a brass mask. Rather than being one piece, it is assembled from the fragments of many augmetics. You have met this man before. He is called Brasswhisper, a member of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's retinue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Gesicht des Techpriesters, der dir gegenübersteht, ist hinter einer Messingmaske verborgen. Sie ist kein einzelnes Teil, sondern aus den Fragmenten vieler Augmentationen zusammengesetzt. Du bist dieser Person schon einmal begegnet. Sie heißt Messingflüsterer und ist Mitglied des Gefolges von Großinquisitor Calcazar.{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}Karşında dikilen Tekno Rahip'in, yüzü pirinç bir maskenin arkasına gizlenmiş durumda. Maske yekpare değil, birçok ogmetik parçası birleştirilerek üretilmiş. Bu adamla daha önce karşılaşmıştın. Pirinçfısıltı ismiyle biliniyor ve Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar'ın maiyetinde yer alıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The face of the Tech-Priest standing opposite is hidden behind a brass mask. Rather than being one piece, it is assembled from the fragments of many augmetics. You have met this man before. He is called Brasswhisper, a member of Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's retinue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Karşında dikilen Tekno Rahip'in yüzü pirinç bir maskenin arkasına gizlenmiş durumda. Maske yekpare değil, birçok ogmetik parçası birleştirilerek üretilmiş. Bu adamla daha önce karşılaşmıştın. Pirinçfısıltı ismiyle biliniyor ve Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar'ın maiyetinden biri.{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
